SELECT id, rno, picture, name, birth, gender, activetime, regdate, memtype, round(case when memtype = '독거노인' then regdate+30 else regdate+14 end - sysdate) as d_day FROM ( SELECT m.id, r.rno, m.picture, m.name, m.birth, m.gender, ss.activetime, r.regdate, m.memtype, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.id ORDER BY COALESCE(r.rno, 0) DESC, r.regdate DESC) AS rn FROM member m JOIN lsupporter l ON m.wid = l.wid LEFT JOIN report r ON r.wcode = l.wcode AND r.id = m.id AND r.retype = '2' JOIN sensorck ss ON ss.id = m.id WHERE l.wid = #{wid} ) subquery WHERE rn = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT m.id, r.rno, m.picture, m.name, m.birth, m.gender, ss.activetime, r.regdate, m.memtype, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.id ORDER BY r.rno DESC) AS rn FROM member m JOIN lsupporter l ON m.wid = l.wid LEFT JOIN report r ON r.wcode = l.wcode AND r.id = m.id AND r.retype = '2' JOIN sensorck ss ON ss.id = m.id WHERE l.wid = #{wid} ) subquery WHERE rn = 1
